page.shortlink: ux component textbox special type property
page.description: Specify if the textbox should have a special behavior, such as Google Address Autocomplete. Details about how the special type should behave are specified by the [Special type settings Property]. Options available are listed below:

section.title: None
section.description: Specifies that no special behaviors should be used.

section.title: GoogleAddressSelect
section.description: Indicates that the textbox should provide autocomplete behavior for addresses using the Google Maps API.
